tool.name: epestfind
tool.description: Finds PEST motifs as potential proteolytic cleavage sites

param.name: window
param.label: Minimal distance between positively charged amino acids

param.name: threshold
param.label: Threshold value to discriminate weak from potential PEST motifs.

param.name: potential
param.label: Decide whether potential PEST motifs should be printed

param.name: poor
param.label: Decide whether poor PEST motifs should be printed

param.name: invalid
param.label: Decide whether invalid PEST motifs should be printed

param.name: map
param.label: Decide whether PEST motifs should be mapped to sequence
